name: Wizard
desc: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
coolFeatures: Masters of magic with access to many spells
Considered to be the smartest most flexible spellcasters
Has a spellbook and can swap between prepared spells each day
Studied wizard schools include: Bladesinging, Abjuration, Conjuration, Divination, Enchantment, Evocation, Illusion, Necromancy, Transmutation, and War Magic
prompts: How did your character first come into contact with magic?
Do you have a natural talent, or did you simply study hard and practice incessantly?
What drew you forth from your life of study?
What drives you to study magic?
Did you serve as a Wandslinger in the Last War?
Do you study the many secrets of Eberron, Siberys, and Khyber?
